value.title: DAX Fridays #16: DATEADD
value.excerpt: DATEADD is a really useful function to create sets of dates backwords or forward from a point in time. It is used for Previous date calculations. value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI   Using GroupBy Function in DAX

You can also do it in DAX using some functions. One of the functions that can be used for grouping and aggregation is Group
